snippet.title: Myrne: The Quest - Trailer (1.3 update)
snippet.description:
Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/589470

Hey guys!

Myrne: The Quest is a first-person action-RPG. It's the follow-up of Song of the Myrne: What Lies Beneath (no need to have played it to fully enjoy this one though). 

This is a single player game, following a story, where everything is hand-crafted.

Return back to the world of the Myrne with its silly humor and discover why the night never goes away in this new region... Or don't, you're just here for that magic artifact after all, no way this malediction will have anything to do with your personal quest... Erm...
